definition.text: Verify that the Production Trading Tasks tasks for the corresponding Market were created successfully.

translations.text: Verifica que las tareas Production Trading Tasks se crearon con Ã©xito para el Market correspondiente.

paragraphs.text: Look for the following data structures:

translations.text: Busca las siguientes estructuras de datos:

paragraphs.text: A Market Trading Tasks node for the new market.

translations.text: Un Market Trading Tasks nodo para el nuevo mercado.

paragraphs.text: One Trading Mine Tasks node for each trading mine included in the workspace.
One Task Manager per Trading Mine and one Task with a Backtesting Session for each Trading System in the workspace.

translations.text: Un Task Manager por Trading Mine y un Task con una Backtesting Session para cada Trading System en el espacio de trabajo.
